newsitem.title: GHANA: Ghana's August yr-on-yr inflation at 39.2 percent.
newsitem.headline: Ghana's August yr-on-yr inflation at 39.2 percent.

text.p: Ghana's government statistical service issued the following updated price inflation figures:

NOTE: Consumer inflation in Ghana has now fallen for the eighth successive month reflecting a central bank policy of maintaining high interest rates -- 46.9 percent in August for 91-day T-bills -- to mop up excess liquidity. * Prices in August showed an average increase of 1.0 percent, a setback on -0.2 percent in July. * The government's objective is to reduce year-on-year inflation to 20 percent by December 31, 1996.
